name: Quantum Foam
description:
Placeholder for the Cat Fission Scientist 2022 Epic MegaJam entry.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Mouse - camera
  • Left click - jetpack
  • Right click - grapple hook (but it's invisible)
  • E - interact
  • Escape - menu

Made before the jam started:

  • Settings widget
  • Swim Component
  • Boat Model
  • Epic Mannequin & Third Person template content
  • Generic Interaction System
  • Skybox
  • Neocity models
  • Title font
